item.title: Multinode OpenStack with Packstack
item.description: I was the presenter for this morning’s RDO hangout, where I ran through a simple demonstration of setting up a multinode OpenStack deployment using packstack. The slides are online here. Here’s the video (also available on the event page):
item.content:
I was the presenter for this morning’s RDO hangout, where I ran through a simple demonstration of setting up a multinode OpenStack deployment using packstack.

The slides are online here.

Here’s the video (also available on the event page):
